name: The Secret Atelier
description:
From the creator of the Super Naughty Maid series!

STORY


You are the advisor of the art club and the only other person in there is Ichijou Erika. She offers to be a model for the club but your eyes begin to wander towards her erotic body. Something she is very aware of.

"I wouldn't mind... if it were with you... ♥♥"

How will you maintain your composure in front of her lascivious invitation?!

FEATURES

  • Full 3D animation
  • Improved animation and quality that really shows off the realistic softness of each motion.
  • Multiple scenes and positions to choose from as well as new variations from previous releases.
  • Chapter select mode to jump between scenes
  • Listen to Erika's perverted thoughts with the lewd voice function.
  • English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese text language options
